Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier track switching problems near Roosevelt. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier track switching problems near Roosevelt.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed near Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to track switching problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to track switching problems.

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
